coindescs.desc: [EndSkill] Heal 2 other allies with the least HP percentage for 15% of this unit's Max HP
[EndSkill] Heal 2 other allies with the least HP percentage for 25% of this unit's Max HP
[EndSkillHead] If the target is Staggered or defeated, apply 10% of this unit's Max HP as Shield to allies that this unit healed
[EndSkill] Heal 2 other allies with the least HP percentage for 30% of this unit's Max HP
[EndSkillHead] If the target is Staggered or defeated, apply 15% of this unit's Max HP as Shield to allies that this unit healed

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttackTail] If the target is Staggered or defeated, heal 5 SP on self

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] If the target is Staggered or defeated, heal 7 SP on self

levelList.name: Deseo Sangriento
levelList.desc:
Coin Power +1 for every 2 [Laceration] on target (max 6)
[StartBattle] The main target for this Skill does not lose [Laceration] Count for this turn.
[EndSkill] For 3 turns, Lose 10 SP at Turn End.

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict Lust Affinity damage equal to [Laceration] Potency on target.
- At 4+ Lust Reson., inflict Lust Affinity damage equal to ([Laceration] Potency on target x 1.2).
([Laceration] Potency up to only 99 will be used to calculate for this Skill.)
coindescs.summary: [OnSucceedAttack] Deal Lust Affinity damage based on [Laceration] on target

coindescs.desc: [EnemyKill] If this Skill or its Coin effects dealt damage that exceeds the target's(In Focused Encounters, the Core's) remaining HP, deal the excess damage as fixed damage between all enemies.
coindescs.summary: [EnemyKill] Inflict the excess damage between all enemies.

(Maximum Lust Reson. taken into account : 4)
